channel.title: CVE Feed for Elsight -- Elsight Halo
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elsight -- Elsight Halo

item.title: CVE-2022-36784|2024-08-03T10:14:28.444Z -- elsight -- elsight%20halo
item.description: Elsight – Elsight Halo Remote Code Execution (RCE) Elsight Halo web panel allows us to perform connection validation. through the POST request : /api/v1/nics/wifi/wlan0/ping we can abuse DESTINATION parameter and leverage it to remote code execution.
